name: part_004
file: tmp_【Ayunda Risu 3D Birthday】The Rise of the NUT Warrior 【#TheNutWarrior】 [VYSAfYJ6FhI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Risu hears a mysterious voice while acting out her journey in a 3D environment.
IRyS appears as the Fireblade Priestess and gives Risu a trial.
Intro sequence for the musical performance.
IRyS and Risu perform the song 'Dragon Screamer'.
IRyS rewards Risu with the legendary weapon, the Nut Blade.
Risu continues her journey across the world map.

subtitles.original: As I, the keeper of the legendary weapon Nut Blade,
subtitles.english: As I, the keeper of the legendary weapon Nut Blade,

subtitles.original: will lend you its power.
subtitles.english: will lend you its power.

subtitles.original: Is this... the voice of the Fireblade Priestess?
subtitles.english: Is this... the voice of the Fireblade Priestess?

subtitles.original: Yes, you are right.
subtitles.english: Yes, you are right.

subtitles.original: I will lend you the power of this Nut Blade
subtitles.english: I will lend you the power of this Nut Blade

subtitles.original: if you can prove yourself that you have the spirit to fight the pink giant monster.
subtitles.english: if you can prove yourself that you have the spirit to fight the pink giant monster.

subtitles.original: Hah! Okay!
subtitles.english: Hah! Okay!

subtitles.original: Dragon Screamer!
subtitles.english: Dragon Screamer!

subtitles.english: Dragon Screamer!

subtitles.original: 胸に刻めよ 時代のリーダー
subtitles.english: Carve it into your chest, the leader of the era

subtitles.english: This is quite something more than it looks

subtitles.original: 乾いた心 すさむよりは
subtitles.english: Rather than letting your dry heart grow cold,

subtitles.english: try crying sometimes

subtitles.original: 見えてくる明日 駆けるのは
subtitles.english: What runs toward the tomorrow you can see,

subtitles.original: 紛れもなく 新しい自分
subtitles.english: is unmistakably a new you

subtitles.original: 誰かのためでもなく
subtitles.english: Not for anyone else,

subtitles.english: just aim for even higher

subtitles.english: If you have the courage to step forward,

subtitles.english: the path will eventually open up

subtitles.english: Choosing the place to aim for,
